title: Revanth, Messi to kick off Hyderabad’s ‘GOAT’ moment
content: Proposed exhibition match likely to be scheduled on December 13, either at the Rajiv Gandhi stadium in Uppal or the Gachibowli stadium

title: Expert panel to look into woman’s death of post-delivery sepsis at SAT
content: Health dept. constitutes panel after the woman’s family, who alleged that she contracted the infection from the hospital, sought an inquiry by an external medical body. SAT has denied the possibility of her getting infected at the hospital

title: India and China have goodwill towards us, says Sri Lankan PM
content: We have brought about many changes in our political culture; We have been very responsive to governance, we have allowed people to process what we are trying to do, says Harini Amarasuriya, adding that things have not moved faster at the grassroots level

title: Police across Telangana put on high alert after Red Fort blast in Delhi
content: All city police commissioners and district Superintendents of Police were alerted and instructed to deploy Blue Colts and other field units to maintain heightened vigilance

title: ‘Orbit Wallet’ to power ‘smart commuting’ in Electronics City
content: The card integrates transport, shopping, and digital payments into a single platform, offering employees a convenient and tech-driven solution for daily commutes

title: LDF announces candidates for Thiruvananthapuram Corporation polls; Mayor Arya Rajendran not in the fray
content: Candidates for 93 wards declared; eight to be announced later. The CPI(M) will contest in 70 wards, while CPI will field candidates in 17 wards. Thirteen candidates are under the age of 30, while 12 are below 40

title: India-Sri Lanka joint military exercise begins in Belagavi
content: The exercise integrates the employment of drones, counter-unmanned aerial systems and helicopters; joint drills will include securing helipads and conducting casualty evacuation under operational conditions, the Defence Ministry said

title: This bypoll will be a barometer of Congress, BJP and BRS popularity
content: The contest is more between Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy, BRS working president K. T. Rama Rao and Union Minister G Kishan Reddy than between the contestants

title: V-C refers Sanskrit PhD row to Kerala University Syndicate
content: The Dean has objected to awarding the PhD to the research scholar, who then filed a formal complaint with the V-C alleging caste discrimination. University regulations lack clarity on the procedures to be followed when the Dean and the chairperson of the open defence hold conflicting views and the matter was referred to the V-C. The Syndicate will have the final say

title: Steps taken to avert drinking water disruption in the wake of storage tank collapse, says Minister
content: Since the Model Code of Conduct has come into effect with the notification of the local body polls, the Disaster Management Act has been invoked to ensure that ongoing works are not affected, says Minister Roshy Augustine

title: DGP lays foundation for City Training Centre, inaugurates Bharosa and Command Control Centres in Rachakonda
content: Top cop says CTC would enable specialised training programmes for police personnel, particularly in dealing with crimes involving technology

title: Antibiogram 2025 released; AMR shows a slight dip
content: The annual report of 2025 depicts AMR data from January 1 to December 31, 2024, collected from 47 surveillance laboratories from 13 districts which are part of the Kerala Antimicrobial Resistance Surveillance Network

title: Impartiality, effective utilisation must for quick rural development, says panel deputy chief
content: Deputy Chairman of the State Decentralised Planning and Development Committee D.R. Patil chairs a progress review meeting on the District Annual Draft Development Plan in Dharwad

title: All You Need To Know About The Powerful Explosion Near Delhi's Red Fort
content: A powerful explosion near Delhi's Red Fort on Sunday evening sent shockwaves across the national capital. The blast, which triggered a massive fire and damaged multiple vehicles, led to a high alert across the city.

title: Delhi Car Blast Took Place At 6.52 pm, Car Was Moving Slowly Near Red Light
content: Deputy Fire Officer AK Malik said seven units were rushed to the spot when a call was received about the blast, that has left eight people dead and 24 injured.

title: "Body Torn Into Pieces, Hand Lying On Road": Delhi Blast Eyewitness To NDTV
content: An eyewitness to the explosion in a car near Delhi's Red Fort today told NDTV he saw body parts fly and land on the road, right in front of him. Eight people were killed and 24 were injured.

title: NIA Team Heads To Red Fort, Amit Shah Speaks To Delhi Cops: What We Know
content: Eight people were killed and 24 were injured after an explosion in a car at a crowded area near the Red Fort in Delhi today. The vehicle exploded outside gate No. 1 of Lal Quila metro station. The National Investigation Agency has gone to the site.

title: Delhi Red Fort Blast: Mumbai, Uttar Pradesh On High Alert
content: Mumbai is on high alert after eight people died and six were injured in a high-intensity explosion in a car at a crowded area near the Red Fort.

title: Third Explosion Since 1997 At Red Fort: Timeline Of Previous Blasts In Delhi
content: Eight people are feared dead and 11 injured after a high-intensity explosion ripped through a carnear Delhi's Red Fort this evening, officials said.Three to four vehicles that were near the car also caught fire and sustained damage.

title: Red Fort Blast Live: 8 Dead After Explosion In Car Near Red Fort In Delhi
content: Delhi Blast: Eight people are dead and 24 injured after a blast in a car near Red Fort on Monday evening, officials said.

title: Video: Fire Rages, Chaos After Blast In Car Near Delhi's Red Fort
content: A blast occurred in a car near the Red Fort metro station, prompting fire services and the special cell team to rush to the spot.

title: On Camera, Speeding BMW Runs Over Scooter In Gujarat, Rider Dies On Spot
content: A scooter rider was killed in a gruesome accident after being hit by a speeding BMW car in Gujarat's Rajkot in the early hours of Monday.

title: Battleground Bihar: Did Migrants Act As Political Influencers?
content: Who will have the last laugh in Bihar in this watershed assembly election where the old guards are seen to be heading for the 'been there, done that' door?

title: Kerala Local Body Elections To Be Held In Two Phases On December 9, 11
content: A separate voter list has also been prepared for Non-Resident Indians (NRIs), which includes a total of 2,841 voters2,484 men and 357 women.

title: Annamalai And Tejasvi Surya Complete Ironman 70.3 In Goa, PM Modi Reacts
content: Tamil Nadu BJP leader K Annamalai and Bengaluru South MP Tejasvi Surya completed the gruelling Ironman 70.3 triathlon in Goa on Sunday, joining over 1,300 athletes from 31 countries in the fifth edition of the race.

title: In Choking Smog, Delhiites Turn To Satire With 'Oxygen Mask Wedding' Video
content: Delhi's plummeting air quality is not only dominating news but is also top of the trending list on social media as Delhiites are using satire to vent their ire against the city's toxic pollution levels.

title: Court Rejects Plea To Enhance Sentence Of Convict In Mumbai Lawyer's Murder
content: Sajjad Pathan was convicted by a sessions court in July 2014 for the murder, molestation and criminal trespass in the killing of the then 25-year-old lawyer.

title: Bhopal Model, 21, Dumped By Lover Outside Hospital, Dies: "Bruises All Over"
content: A 27-year-old model, Khushboo Ahirwar, was found dead under mysterious circumstances early Monday morning after her boyfriend allegedly abandoned her at a private hospital in Madhya Pradesh's Sehore district, before vanishing.

title: "No Question Of Tie-Up With Raj Thackeray's MNS": Congress Amid Alliance Buzz
content: Moments after opposition leaders in Nashik hinted at a local-level understanding with the Raj Thackeray-led Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS), the Congress has categorically distanced itself from the idea.

title: Car Catches Fire After Tyre Burst In Maharashtra, Woman Burns To Death
content: A car caught fire after one of its tyres burst open on the Jalgaon-Chhatrapati Sambhaji Nagar Highway in Maharashtra on Monday, resulting in a passenger's death.

title: Minor Hindu Girls Being Drugged, Assaulted In Hyderabad, Claims BJP Leader
content: The Union minister claimed that young Hindu girls, often minors, are being lured, drugged and subsequently assaulted and kidnapped in parts of Old City.

title: India Proposes E-Commerce Rules Requiring Filters On 'Country Of Origin'
content: TheIndian government on Monday proposed making it mandatory fore-commerceplatforms to provide filters based on 'country of origin', aiming to make domestic products easily discoverable and boost the government's self-reliance initiative.

title: Angry Over Being Called A 'Thief', Girl, 13, Drowns 2 Minor Cousins
content: Two minor siblings drowned after they were pushed into a well allegedly by their 13-year-old female cousin over "thief" taunt in a village in Chhattisgarh's Khairagarh-Chhuikhadan-Gandai (KCG) district, police said on Monday.

title: Malappuram clinches hat-trick win in Kerala school science fest
content: Malappuram secures 1,548 points to claim the championship for the third consecutive year. Though Palakkad and Kannur record 1,487 points each, Palakkad takes second place on the basis of 17 first prizes it won and Kannur third.

title: Ernakulam all set for polls to 111 local bodies on Dec. 9
content: Elections will be held in 82 grama panchayats, 13 municipalities, 14 block panchayats, one corporation, and one district panchayat in the district

title: Central approval for Thiruvananthapuram metro to take at least a year
content: As the initial alignment has changed, details of land acquisition have to be finalised and a new DPR must be prepared, which will require the State government’s approval first, before it is submitted to the Centre. The priorities of the new government, set to be elected in six months, will have a say in the process

title: Karnataka High Court issues tech-driven SOP for handling cases of minor victims of sexual offences
content: A vital provision of the court’s SOP is the direction to establish Digital POCSO Portal, a secure, cloud-based platform integrated with national systems

title: 12,570 hectares of crops damaged in district, says Prakasam Collector
content: Four-member Central team inspects the flooded paddy fields in Allur, NG Padu and Ommevaram villages, as well as the affected fish ponds in Koppolu and Allur villages

title: Petition in Supreme Court says GenAI in judiciary may cause ‘hallucinations’, lead to fake case laws
content: CJI B.R. Gavai posts the case after two weeks; petitioner urges the top court to formulate a strict policy for regulated use of GenAI in courts until a law was put in place

title: Kochi water tank collapse: special protocol to inspect and fortify ageing structures may be devised following tank collapse
content: While the KWA already has a mechanism to inspect ageing structures, an additional system may be introduced in view of the incident, says Minister for Water Resources

title: CPI(M), Congress, BJP finalise ward-level strategies for local body polls
content: The UDF and the LDF believe that the defining battles will unfold primarily between them, with the NDA acting as a third force

title: Delhi court sets aside order to investigate Minister Kapil Mishra’s role in 2020 northeast Delhi riots
content: In a complaint, a Yamuna Vihar resident claimed that, on February 23, 2020, he saw Mr. Mishra and some others along with him blocking the road in Kardampuri and breaking the carts of street vendors. He also said Mr. Mishra threatened anti-CAA protesters of action if they did not vacate the area.

title: Centre to establish ₹750-crore yoga and naturopathy institute in Andhra Pradesh: Health Minister
content: The proposed institute, to function under the Ministry of AYUSH, will offer courses in naturopathy and yogic science, and house a 450-bed hospital and research centre; Centre also plans a ₹100-crore facility near Nadimpalem in Guntur district, he says

title: Simplification in corneal transplantation rules to boost cornea donation and transplantation services
content: The mandatory requirement of the clinical specular equipment in corneal transplantation centres has now been removed under this amendment

title: HC restraint on arrest of  Vijayakumari
content: She has been booked by under the Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of Atrocities) Act for allegedly making casteist remarks against a research scholar

title: A.P. Cabinet approves wide-ranging reforms to drive economic and infrastructure growth
content: Decisions include MoU with Singapore, new tourism projects, funding for Amaravati works, and financial support for farmers and weavers, says I&PR Minister

title: Why has gender-wise data of first phase of polling in Bihar not been disclosed, Tejashwi asks ECI
content: Overall gender ratio in voter turnout is generally given at the time of final turnout, EC official responds to RJD leader

title: Secunderabad station modernisation picks up pace; phased openings over next 13 months
content: Entire project is scheduled for completion by December 2026; PM Modi will inaugurate revamped facility, which will be capable of handling 2.7 lakh passengers daily, says Union Minister Kishan Reddy

title: A.P. seeks ₹901 crore immediate relief for Cyclone Montha damage; total loss estimated at ₹6,384 crore
content: State officials explained to the Central team that preemptive planning by the State government minimized loss of life

title: Madras High Court questions legality of marriage between Madhampatty Rangaraj and Joy Crizildaa
content: Justice N. Senthilkumar finds that she had divorced her first husband only on July 16, 2024 but claims to have married the chef on December 24, 2023

title: Stringent action will be taken against misbehaviour and corruption: Police Commissioner during THTalksBengaluru
content: Seemanth Kumar Singh said the Police Department is trying to repair the perception about police among the public and make them more accessible

title: Enkepally SHG lauded for increased school enrolment
content: The SHG had been active in taking part in community work and their contribution was earlier noted in improved village roads and bus connectivity

title: Nearly 25% of crimes against children occurred in own homes, says Kerala child rights panel report
content: From 1,002 cases in 2013 to 4,607 cases in 2024, there has been a more than four-fold increase in the number of POCSO cases in the State as per the annual report.  Nearly 85% of the survivors were girls and 14% boys

title: Karnataka records 24% drop in maternal deaths; GO issued to rationalise specialists
content: New redeployment plan — based on Tamil Nadu model — aims to further strengthen round the clock maternal and newborn care services

title: Lokesh lauds teacher for developing a school in Kadapa
content: It is commendable and inspiring that a single teacher beautified the school in Karanamvaripalli with the help of villagers. The school children will have a bright future with the efforts of the teacher, who has not only renovated the school but is also providing a comprehensive education, says education minister

title: India, Vietnam boost defence ties at 15th Defence Policy Dialogue
content: Defence Secretary meets Vietnam’s Defence Minister on the sidelines of the India–Vietnam Defence Policy Dialogue in Hanoi

title: With a week left for season, TDB makes elaborate arrangements at Sabarimala
content: Accident insurance scheme implemented for devotees, besides additional toilet facilities, four buildings for accommodation, and five new resting areas

title: India striving for water security with watershed management: Pemmasani
content: Union Minister Pemmasani says Andhra Pradesh emerging as a model State in implementing water conservation schemes; calls for coordinated efforts and public participation to ensure sustainability.

title: Barnwell: The AFC is shifting, but the four new challengers to the conference throne are all flawed
content: We thought the Bills, Chiefs and Ravens would dominate the AFC again this season. But four teams have risen from the pack to challenge -- and possibly pass -- them.

title: Rodgers offers blunt self-assessment after SNF dud
content: "This was not my best performance," QB Aaron Rodgers said after the worst game of his Steelers career, which came in a 25-10 loss to the Chargers on "Sunday Night Football."

title: Report: Kelly rejected LSU buyouts, seeks $54M
content: Former LSU football coach Brian Kelly reportedly rejected settlement offers of $25 million and $30 million dollars and is asking LSU for written confirmation, by Monday 6p ET, that he will get the $54 million he is owed under the terms of his contract.

title: Payne suspended 1 game for St. Brown punch
content: The NFL has suspended Daron Payne for one game after the Commanders defensive lineman punched Lions receiver Amon-Ra St. Brown.

title: Japanese pitcher Imai begins process to join MLB
content: Tatsuya Imai is set to be the next Japanese pitcher to move to a MLB team. His current club, Seibu Lions, said Monday it would begin the process of making Imai available.

title: Campbell takes over playcalling; Lions score 44
content: Lions coach Dan Campbell took over playcalling duties from first-year offensive coordinator John Morton this past week, and it ignited a dominant 44-22 victory over the Washington Commanders on Sunday.

title: Lawrence wows with near-identical defensive TDs
content: DeMarcus Lawrence became the fourth player in NFL history with multiple fumble return touchdowns in the same game, doing so on near-identical plays Sunday against the Cardinals.

title: Legendary NBA player, coach Wilkens dies at 88
content: Lenny Wilkens, a smooth playmaker who was inducted into the Basketball Hall of Fame as both a player and a coach, has died. He was 88.

title: Guardians' Clase, Ortiz indicted for pitch rigging
content: Cleveland Guardians pitchers Emmanuel Clase and Luis Ortiz have been indicted on a host of charges related to an alleged scheme to rig bets on pitches thrown in MLB games. Ortiz is in custody.

title: Potential fatal flaws that could sink 26 playoff contenders
content: Can Ohio State run enough? Will Georgia's D show up? What could trip up Indiana? We look at the best teams' weak spots.

title: Predictions and everything you need to know about MVP, Cy Young and more
content: Baseball's best players and managers of 2025 collect their hardware this week -- starting tonight with the Rookies of the Year.

title: Best, worst of NFL Week 10: Steelers' offense crumbles, plus late meltdowns by the Jaguars and Giants
content: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions from each game. Here's what we learned from Week 10.

title: How Fleetwood Mac and the USC marching band went from a missed phone call to collaborating on 'Tusk'
content: The idea initially sounded so far-fetched band directors thought it was a prank. But the collaboration became a sensation.

title: 'Being in the NFL is hard ... being an Eagle is harder'
content: There is a demand for greatness that fuels achievement and creates an uneasiness for the current Eagles.

title: Is UNC back?! Judging 6 overreactions from opening week of men's hoops
content: From the strength of this freshman class to statement wins, these are conclusions we're drawing early.

title: The NHL's best this week: The future is now for Bedard, Celebrini
content: The No. 1 picks from 2023 and 2024 in the mix for the NHL's scoring lead. Plus, a look at key games coming up.

title: Dowdle, Jones hold off on Hingle McCringleberry celebration
content: Dowdle, who was fined for recreating the "Key & Peele" character's celebration, stopped short of a repeat.

title: What's at stake for every player in the WNBA labor battle
content: From stars with millions in off-court endorsements to those making the minimum, every WNBA player stands to gain in the new CBA.

title: Final in the United States? What the future holds for the UEFA Champions League
content: Are future Champions League finals here to stay in Europe or is there an impending future of Europe's most prestigious club game being played abroad?

title: MLS Cup playoffs Round 1 talking points: Messi, favorites move on
content: Were there any upsets in Round 1 of the MLS Cup playoffs? Not really, but that didn't mean the best-of-three series were short on drama.

title: Maye emerges as NFL MVP favorite amid AFC East chaos
content: Division chaos, MVP campaigns and historic comebacks lead the betting recap for Week 10 of the NFL season.

title: Norris continues to quiet his critics with title-worthy win in Brazil
content: Critics have long questioned Lando Norris' mental fortitude. His win in Brazil should shut them up, and put the F1 title within his reach.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool's Szoboszlai wanted by Man City, Real Madrid
content: Dominik Szoboszlai's Liverpool contract situation is being monitored by Manchester City and Real Madrid. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Delhi blast: 8 killed; top cop says slow-moving car burst into flames at traffic signal
content: A car blast near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station on Monday resulted in at least eight fatalities and 24 injuries. The explosion, which also caused a fire damaging nearby vehicles, has prompted a high alert in the capital and across Uttar Pradesh. The cause of the blast remains under investigation.

title: 'Taking all possibilities into account': Amit Shah on Delhi blast that killed 8; investigation on
content: A blast rocked a Hyundai i20 car near Delhi's Red Fort, injuring pedestrians and damaging vehicles. Union Home Minister Amit Shah confirmed the incident, stating a thorough investigation is underway, exploring all possibilities.  He assured that NSG, NIA, and FSL teams are on-site, examining CCTV footage.  Authorities are prioritizing the probe and will share findings.

title: Red Fort car blast: Delhi, UP, Maharashtra and more states on high alert
content: A car blast near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station has placed the city on high alert, with security agencies investigating the cause. Uttar Pradesh authorities have also heightened security at sensitive locations and border areas, increasing patrols and checks across all districts. The incident has led to widespread alerts and investigations.

title: Philanthropy and policy: Bill Gates on US aid spending; says it’s not our role to help govt save money
content: The Gates Foundation has pledged a significant $2.5 billion over five years to boost global women's health, focusing heavily on research and development for innovations like self-injectable contraceptives and rapid STI diagnostics.

title: Delhi blast: Leaders express grief over loss of lives; demand swift investigation
content: A car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station has killed at least eight people and injured several others. Political leaders across parties have expressed grief and shock, urging a thorough and time-bound investigation into the incident. The blast triggered a fire, engulfing nearby vehicles, and a high alert has been issued.

title: ‘Saw a hand on road’: Eye witnesses recount moments after Delhi blast - watch
content: A car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station killed at least eight people and injured several others, triggering a massive fire that engulfed multiple vehicles. The blast caused panic and shock in the area, with eyewitnesses describing intense flames and a deafening sound. Authorities have launched an investigation, with forensic teams examining the site.

title: Extend your laptop’s battery: How to revive and mistakes to avoid; tips to guide you
content: Many users unknowingly damage their laptop batteries through common mistakes like overcharging, using cheap chargers, and exposing devices to extreme temperatures. These habits shorten battery lifespan and reduce device efficiency. By adopting mindful charging practices, using certified accessories, and managing settings, users can significantly extend their laptop battery's longevity and performance.

title: Watch: Blast in parked car near Red Fort; videos show panic, chaos at site
content: A blast rocked a parked car near Delhi's Red Fort on Monday evening, causing panic and prompting an immediate response from five fire tenders. The explosion, which occurred near the Lal Qila Metro Station, also affected nearby vehicles. Authorities have cordoned off the area as investigations are underway.

title: National Karting C'ship: First-ever Indian female! 9-yo Arshi scripts history
content: Born in Faridabad on October 18, 2016, Arshi races under Leapfrog Racing. She demonstrated her exceptional skills by winning Round 3 at the Madras International Karting Arena in August 2025, followed by victories in Coimbatore. In the final round, Arshi showcased remarkable performance by winning both the Pre-Final and Final races in the Micro Max class for ages 8 to 12 years.

title: 2900 kg of explosives: Major terror module busted in Delhi-NCR; what cops found
content: Jammu & Kashmir and Haryana Police jointly recovered 360 kg of suspected ammonium nitrate, arms, and bomb-making equipment in Faridabad. Two individuals, including a doctor, were arrested as part of a two-week-long investigation. Officials suspect the seized materials were intended for large-scale terror attacks in the Delhi-NCR region.

title: Sam Altman says, ‘Slack creates a lot of fake work’; Elon Musk responds
content: Elon Musk reacted sharply to Sam Altman's critique of office productivity tools, predicting OpenAI will now directly compete with Microsoft. Altman suggested AI agents could replace tools like Slack, creating "fake work." OpenAI's potential move into selling "AI cloud" services further escalates competition with tech giants.

title: 'Katta, nachaniya & more ': When netas turned dialogue writers for Bihar polls campaign
content: Bihar's 2025 election campaign has transformed into a political theatre, with leaders employing sharp, witty one-liners reminiscent of Bollywood dialogues. Prime Minister Modi accused the INDIA bloc of strong-arming for power, while Yogi Adityanath used cartoonish satire. Mallikarjun Kharge mocked Modi's perceived arrogance, and Rahul Gandhi critiqued the spectacle of power.

title: Why Honda's new product offensive is not just about new models but about new mindset
content: Honda is making a significant  push in India with plans to launch 10 new models by 2030, including seven SUVs, and a diverse range of petrol, hybrid, and electric vehicles. This strategic shift aims to capture a wider market, moving beyond its traditional strengths to compete aggressively and ensure long-term growth in the Indian automotive landscape.

title: After being awarded 1 lakh per run scored in final, Richa Ghosh to get new stadium
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee announced a new cricket stadium in Siliguri, hometown of World Cup-winning player Richa Ghosh, to be named 'Richa Cricket Stadium'. The 22-year-old wicketkeeper-batter was also recently honored with the 'Banga Bhushan' award and appointed a Deputy Superintendent of Police. Siliguri in north Bengal is Ghosh’s hometown.

title: Michael Willis Heard death: How TikTok star Yes King tragically died
content: TikTok sensation Michael Willis Heard, known as 'Yes King,' has passed away. His daughter confirmed the news, remembering him for his uplifting videos promoting self-love and confidence. The Elyria, Ohio native, who also served as a life coach and pastor-like figure, inspired millions with his positive energy. His sudden departure has deeply saddened his global fanbase.

title: Tom Brady’s blunt take as FOX Sports replaces Sanchez with Brees
content: Tom Brady reacts to Drew Brees replacing Mark Sanchez at FOX Sports as the network cuts ties with Sanchez amid his felony case. Brady’s accuracy comment, Brees’ career stats and statements, and FOX’s broadcast shakeup headline a major shift. Full details on Brees’ new role, Sanchez’s exit and what Brady’s reaction means for FOX Sports.

title: Aaron Rodgers’ wife Brittani sparks fresh mystery after shocking SNF update
content: Aaron Rodgers' marriage to Brittani has become a major talking point, with no one, not even his teammates or family, having met her. Rodgers stated his wife is private and chooses not to be in the public eye, leaving her identity and presence a mystery despite his openness about being married.

title: 'White collar' terror network: Police arrest woman doctor from Lucknow; AK-47 recovered from her car
content: A Lucknow-based woman doctor, Shaheen, was arrested for alleged involvement in a terror module spanning Jammu and Kashmir, Haryana, and Uttar Pradesh.  The operation, a joint effort by multiple police forces and central agencies, also led to the seizure of explosives and the uncovering of a network linked to terror groups.

title: BBC chair admits ‘error of judgement’ in Trump film edit, issues apology
content: BBC chair Samir Shah has apologized for an editing "error of judgement" in a Donald Trump documentary, admitting it wrongly implied a call for violence.  Hundreds of complaints prompted the apology, with Shah stating the BBC aims to maintain trust and correct mistakes swiftly.  Downing Street emphasized accountability for public broadcasters.

title: Actor Dharmendra in critical condition, placed on ventilator support
content: The legendary and veteran actor, Dharmendra was recently admitted to the Breach Candy Hospital in Mumbai, sparking immediate concern among his millions of fans. Latest reports suggest that the veteran actor has been placed on ventilator support.

title: Budget 2026: Pre-budget talks begin, chaired by Nirmala Sitharaman; tax reforms, manufacturing push in focus
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman commenced pre-Budget consultations for the 2026-27 fiscal year, engaging with leading economists and agricultural stakeholders. These crucial discussions aim to incorporate diverse feedback and sectoral insights into the upcoming budget. Industry bodies have already proposed tax reforms and manufacturing incentives, setting the stage for Sitharaman's February 1st presentation.

title: Making of India's 91st GM: Battling financial troubles, 'negative emotions' | Exclusive
content: Chennai's Raahul VS achieved a significant milestone by becoming India's 91st Grandmaster. He secured the title by winning the 6th ASEAN Individual Open Chess Championship. This direct title win is a rare accomplishment. Raahul overcame financial struggles and mental challenges to reach this point. He now aims for further success in his chess career.

title: ‘SIR is votebandi’: Mamata slams EC, BJP over voter roll revision; questions ‘hurry’
content: West Bengal chief minister Mamata Banerjee has strongly criticized the Election Commission's special intensive revision of voter rolls. She labeled the process 'votebandi', comparing it to demonetisation and alleging it is being conducted hastily before elections. Banerjee demanded an immediate halt to the exercise, asserting that voter rights should not be curbed.

title: Dwyane Wade says daughter Kaavia hilariously calls out his parenting
content: Dwyane Wade and his daughter Kaavia are enjoying movie nights while Gabrielle Union is away.  The young Kaavia actively participates in their parenting, even sending notes to her father when she's unhappy with his decisions.  The family recently celebrated Kaavia's 7th birthday, with both parents expressing their love and joy.

title: 'Sir, I can do it. Are you ready?' The coaches who made Jemimahs and Kaurs
content: The players will remain the faces of this victory. They deserve every bit of it. But the coaches, too, deserve their moment. They believed in them before anyone else did. They picked up these champions when their confidence was broken. When the dream looked buried under dust, the Prashants, Pawans, and Nagesh Guptas dusted it off and handed it back.

title: New pill cuts bad cholesterol by 60 percent: Could it become a game-changer in heart attack prevention?
content: A new pill called Enlicitide from Merck offers hope for cholesterol management. This first-ever oral PCSK9 inhibitor demonstrated substantial LDL reductions in a recent trial.  It works alongside statins to lower bad cholesterol.  This development could be a breakthrough for patients needing more effective treatment options.

title: Shutdown Breakers: Meet the Democrats who decided to end deadlock
content: A bipartisan group of Senators ended a 40-day government shutdown, the longest in US history, citing the severe impact on federal workers and the public. Key figures like Dick Durbin and Tim Kaine emphasized the need to end the disruption and secure votes on crucial issues like ACA subsidies and worker protections.

title: Despite bumper IPO, Lenskart stumbles on D-Street, was it hype or bad timing?
content: Lenskart's stock market debut fell short of expectations. The eyewear platform opened lower than its issue price. Investors showed caution due to high valuation and questions about profit quality. A shift in market mood also impacted the listing. Lenskart's future performance hinges on demonstrating sustainable profitability.

title: Mariam Cisse death: Mali TikTok star killed by extremists during livestream
content: A young Malian TikTok star, Mariam Cisse, was brutally executed by extremists during a livestream in early November 2025. Known for her cheerful videos and support for the Malian army, her public killing in Tonka serves as a chilling warning. This incident highlights the escalating dangers for free expression online in northern Mali, where fear and violence are rampant.

title: Noah Gray gets Salute to Service nod as Chiefs' Kelce successor buzz grows
content: Kansas City Chiefs are preparing for life after Travis Kelce, with tight end Noah Gray emerging as a respected leader, recognized for his military support.  While Gray shines off-field, the team also eyes potential future talent like Oregon's Kenyon Sadiq in the upcoming NFL Draft. Gray's dedication is already shaping the Chiefs' next era.

title: How Uttarakhand dairy duped Tirupati trust for 5 yrs with 68L kg fake ghee
content: A CBI probe into the Tirupati laddu ghee case has uncovered a massive scam. Bhole Baba Organic Dairy, contracted by the TTD, allegedly supplied 68 lakh kg of fake ghee worth Rs 250 crore over five years without procuring any milk. Promoters are accused of using palm oil and chemicals to manufacture the spurious product.

title: Viral! Messi returns to Barcelona's Camp Nou: 'A place I miss with my soul'
content: Lionel Messi made an emotional, unannounced return to Camp Nou after leading Inter Miami to a playoff victory. The football icon, who left Barcelona due to financial issues, expressed his deep connection to the club and a desire to return.  His visit follows a stellar performance where he achieved his 400th career assist.

title: 'Intolerant Cong': BJP on Tharoor's Advani remark row, cites 'insecurity' of Nehru-Gandhi family
content: The Bharatiya Janata Party has criticiSed the Indian National Congress. This follows the Congress party distancing itself from Shashi Tharoor's birthday wishes for veteran BJP leader LK Advani. The BJP questioned the Congress's intolerance. Tharoor had called Advani a statesman. Critics accused Tharoor of ignoring Advani's role in divisive politics.

title: Huge revelation! How 'unsold' Agarwal convinced RCB to sign him - 'I was brutally honest'
content: Mayank Agarwal, initially unsold in the IPL auction, found a lifeline with Royal Challengers Bangalore as a replacement. He shared his journey of self-improvement after the snub and impressed in a trial to secure his spot. Agarwal contributed significantly to RCB's historic maiden IPL title win, showcasing an improved strike rate in his appearances.

title: Jubilee Hills bypoll: High-stakes voting tomorrow in Telangana; what to expect
content: Polling for the Jubilee Hills Assembly by-election in Telangana is set for Monday, with over 4.01 lakh voters to cast their ballots. The intense campaign saw top leaders from Congress, BRS, and BJP actively participating. Over 1,700 police personnel and CISF have been deployed to ensure smooth voting, with webcasting at all polling stations.

title: IPL 2026 mini-auction likely to be held in Abu Dhabi
content: Abu Dhabi is set to host the IPL 2026 mini-auction around December 15-16, continuing the trend of overseas venues.  Meanwhile, a significant trade involving Sanju Samson moving to CSK for Ravindra Jadeja is nearing completion.  The Women's Premier League auction is scheduled for November 27 in Delhi, with teams having already announced their retained players.

title: 12 suitcases, 20 timers & a rifle: Twist in Delhi arms bust case; woman doctor under lens
content: A significant counter-terror operation in Faridabad has unearthed a large cache of explosives and weapons, including 360 kg of suspected ammonium nitrate and an assault rifle. This discovery follows the arrest of a doctor linked to Jaish-e-Mohammed, suggesting a major terror module has been dismantled. Investigations are ongoing to apprehend further operatives.

title: US' Jimmy John’s in India soon? Haldiram in talks with Inspire Brands
content: Indian food giant Haldiram Group is reportedly in talks with US-based Inspire Brands for an exclusive franchise deal to launch Jimmy John's sandwich chain in India. This move aims to tap into the growing demand for western-style quick-service restaurants and compete with global players like Subway. The expansion would be separate from Haldiram's existing ethnic food business.

title: IPL: 'Jadeja has to be there' - Raina warns CSK amid IPL trade buzz with RR
content: Indian Premier League trade rumors are swirling around a potential blockbuster deal involving Ravindra Jadeja, Sanju Samson, and Sam Curran between CSK and RR. CSK legend Suresh Raina has strongly urged the franchise to retain Jadeja, emphasizing his crucial role. The article also highlights Raina's suggestions for players CSK should release.

title: Blue Origin postpones New Glenn rocket launch to 12 November 2025 due to weather
content: Blue Origin's New Glenn rocket launch carrying NASA's ESCAPADE Mars probes was postponed due to unfavorable weather at Cape Canaveral. The delay, initially set for November 9, 2025, was further complicated by new FAA restrictions on commercial launches during the ongoing government shutdown. The next launch attempt is now scheduled for November 12, 2025.

title: Watch: Passenger films bizarre bath on train; railways identifies man, takes action
content: A man bathing in a train compartment for a viral video has led to his identification and legal action by railway authorities. The individual admitted to the stunt for online popularity, highlighting a growing trend of inappropriate behavior in public spaces for social media attention. Railway officials are urging passengers to maintain decorum and avoid disturbing fellow travelers.

title: Straight out of ‘Dolly Ki Doli’: ‘Looteri dulhan’ married over 10 men; here’s how cops tracked her
content: Police have arrested Rani Kumari, a woman accused of marrying dozens of men for mere hours before disappearing with their valuables. Her husband and mother, also part of the gang, were apprehended alongside her. Authorities recovered cash and jewelry. Another gang member was later caught with a significant sum and a vehicle. This gang targeted families through fraudulent marriages.

title: 'Grateful to be living in Goa': Jonty Rhodes says Delhi air 'hard to digest'
content: South African cricket legend Jonty Rhodes voiced concern over Delhi's severe air quality, contrasting it with his clean Goan home. The capital endured a thick smog, with AQI readings in the 'very poor' category, nearing 'severe'. Delhi's environment minister highlighted government efforts while criticizing the previous administration's decade of inaction on pollution.

title: Tiering all 32 NFL teams by their playoff chances
content: team strength, injuries, tiebreakers, future strength of schedule and more can shift odds up or down . ESPN analytics writer seth Walder broke down all 32 teams into nine tiers of playoff hopes . the tier is based on information from ESPN's Football Power Index (FPI), betting lines , performance metrics, health status and some instinct .
